Title: Requires landlords to replace a lock on a tenant's door when domestic violence is alleged
Summary: Requires landlords to replace a lock on a tenant's dwelling door within 24 hours of an alleged domestic violence incident; provides civil penalties for violations in relation thereto.
LawCode: Add ยง238-b, RP L; amd ยง51-c, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the multiple dwelling law, in relation to requiring landlords to replace a lock on a tenant's door when domestic violence is alleged
